Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text:
Good food and great ambience.

Ambience: (4/5) ‚Ä¶

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: One of the nicest terraces in the historic center outside the tourist bustle. Great neighborhood hangout. Good selection of beers. Conventional menu. I can't really vouch for the quality of the meals, but have had some good lunches. (I just ‚Ä¶

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Nice little place, we were originally going to Bakers and Roasters but seemed very busy, so we popped in here and we were glad we did, good gastropub food. It is just what you need walking around amsterdam all day, staff were very friendly too!

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Nice waiters and tasty large portions. Fast service. Close to the Boats museum

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text:
Very Authentic and Local with Good food and incredible service.

Sometimes, you discover places, wandering and are truly amazed by the vibe and ‚Ä¶

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: We were with friends and our kids on sinterklas day. The staff was very nice, also with the kids. Coffee was good. It's cozy inside were we sat with the kids running away from the cold wind. Gewoonlijk Nederlandse publiek.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Nice pub but Typical Dutch food. Go elsewhere to eat

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Found this place after a visit to the Maritime museum. So glad we opted to eat here. Had a terrific lunch.  Caesar salad with chicken and a chicken and bacon sandwich.  Both were amazing. The coffee was delicious also!Highly recommend you try this place if you are in the area. Service was quick and attentive

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Great sandwiches and soups at an excellent price. I warmly recommend this place to tourists and locals alike. The photo is of their chicken and bacon sandwich. The wait time was slightly long (30-35 mins), but the atmosphere is good and the food is worth it! The dishes are also very well presented.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Cozy pub with nice thin pizza. Soup was nice too. Special menu (not from their printed standard menu) are available for dinner only.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: We came here for breakfast spontaneous and it was the best decision! Everything was so tasty and the staff was very friendly. 10/10 would recommend!

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Very bad service!!!!! If you order some meal they make a mistake and bring you what you didn't ordered. Only three types of pizza they have: one Tuna (Parmesan), second with grilled vegetables (Feta) and Mozzarella. So they bring you pizza ‚Ä¶

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: A cracking canal side bar, with great staff and good beer. If you are heading to Artis Zoo or any of the shopping streets down here then Orloff is a great stop off.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Very slow service, waited 45 mins for our breakfast, they didnt bringed all order.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Great service and delicious food!

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text:
1.5 mtr is no issue inside
Outside there is a large terrace with great view on the old VOC  Sea ships. ‚Ä¶

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Food was amazing- make no mistake. This rating is purely for the lax service. I had to chase down my waiter both for my order and the check. It's definitely a spot for the locals. I was there on a Friday around 7 and it wasn't overly busy ‚Ä¶

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Superb local spot and very noice waiter(s). Always smiling and in for a cheeky chat. Their ‚Äòkaas stengles‚Äô are the best combined with a cold ‚Äòwitbiertje‚Äô on their big terrace. Great place outside the busy areas, but a most go if you are around the north east side of the centre.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Excellent place to eat and relax. The sandwichs are very tasty, well presented and served relatively quickly. Besides, the mood inside is very cosy: Candles, smooth jazz music and film posters all around. Highly recommended to eat or to grab a coffee after a long walk!

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Fantastic Bar to grab a drink or a bite with friends or family. We were warmly received by bartender 'Yaad' who took care of us during our visit with great enthusiasm and hospitality. Overall a great experience and well worth the visit! I will definitly be back if i get the chance.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Great for after-work drinks, especially with colleagues from Oracle. The staff at Orloff is very nice, but you have to pro-actively approach them, maybe even go to the bar and order. Otherwise you would wait very long.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Great food and service. We just said it was our best meal in Amsterdam other than super pricey dinners, and on par with them! Red lentil soup and trout sandwich were standouts.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Nice place to grab some snacks and drinks

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Nice and cozy place! We had the Libanese pizza which was very good.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: While looking for our AirB&B this was our first stop in Amsterdam. Super delicious food, reasonably priced. The BLT was a huge openfaced sandwich (and delicious)! The employees were so nice and even left the restaurant to help us find our apartment. Highly recommend!

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Cozy little pub to drink a beer. It's usually full of great people just having cheerful conversation.and therefore is a great place to sit, have a beer and hang out with your friends! üçª

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text:
We sat outside and had to go inside to order, after waiting for atleast 5 minutes.
I ordered the 'complete breakfast'. The size was a bad joke for the price of ‚Ä¶

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: little cozy coffee shop, with helpful staff. especially the lady and a guy who is around 50. They always let me use the toilet even if i am not buying anything. As i deliver news paper so i am in a need of toilet. Great coffee as well.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Cool and simple neighbourhood pub - good and cheap eats in the line of the 'bruin caf√©s', big outdoor terrace ideal to seat in sunny days and see the locals passing by. Please, do not act as the regular tourist and go along with the locals ;)

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Lovely sandwiches. Fresh and very tasty.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Delicious flatbreads, coffees and beers

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Small bar with a very local/cosy setting

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Best breakfast we've had in Amsterdam. Great croissant and awesome pancakes. Nice staff (pets are welcome!)

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: I really love this place, the staff is especially really nice they take care of you. I go here with all my friends and they are never disappointed. It is very cozy and the best things happen here. A recommend this place

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Good food, good atmosphere and good service.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Staff is friendly and atmosphere warm, great place for breakfast. Service can be a bit slow though.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Amazing food, atmosphere, and music. Everyone has a book, the play classic music like the Velvet Underground and Temptations. I could stay here all day.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Very relaxing, friendly environment with reasonable prices on good food. Feel local and not touristy. One heads up: doesn't take credit cards so have cash or mastercard debit on hand to pay.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Decent place for a simple breakfast.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Great pizza ! The kitchen was closing at 17:00 but the lady didnt refuse our order even though we came after 17:00.

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: I was yesterday having a drink with my girlfriend and I had most lovely waiter with the stoney island shirt. Best service and best location!

Name: cafe Orloff
Review Text: Great selection of beers and amazing staff.
